title: NOD32 Smart Security Suite (With Crack)
description:
This is Nod32 Smart Security Suite

Version 3.0.642.0

Comes with working crack, extends license to 2000 days.

Tested working.

Installation steps:

Extract the ZIP to your desktop or where ever you put your torrent files

open the "installers" folder

Select your architecture ("x86" if you don&#039;t know)

Run the installer

REALLY IMPORTANT: THE CRACK WILL NOT WORK RIGHT IF YOU DON&#039;T DO THIS:

When the installer asks you for a user name and password check the box below the fields marked "give update parameters later"

If this is not checked the installer will not finish, and the crack won&#039;t work.

After the installer completes don&#039;t reboot yet.

Open the "Crack" folder, run the executable, and finish the wizard (really quick).

After the suite is installed and the crack wizard completes, reboot your machine.

Congrats, you can go into the control panel after you reboot and run updates.
